`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:` // \u5BA2\u6237\u7AEF
 function createSSE(url) {
	const eventSource = new EventSource(url);
	
	eventSource.onmessage = function (event) {
	  const data = JSON.parse(event?.data || "{}");
	  if (data.type === "close") {
		eventSource.close();
	  } else {
		const root = document.getElementById("root");
		root.innerText += data.msg;
	  }
	};

	return eventSource;
}
const sse = createSSE("http://localhost:3000/sse");


// \u670D\u52A1\u7AEF
const http = require("http");

const server = http.createServer((req, res) => {
  if (req.url === "/sse") {
    res.writeHead(200, {
      "Content-Type": "text/event-stream", // \u5FC5\u987B\u6307\u5B9A
      "Access-Control-Allow-Origin": "*", // demo\u4E2D\u89E3\u51B3\u8DE8\u57DF
      Connection: "keep-alive", // \u8BF7\u6C42\u5B8C\u6210\u540E\u4F9D\u65E7\u4FDD\u6301\u8FDE\u63A5\u4E0D\u5173\u95ED\uFF0C\u4E0D\u540Chttp\u7248\u672C\u9ED8\u8BA4\u503C\u4E0D\u540C
      "Cache-Control": "no-cache", // \u4E0D\u7F13\u5B58
    });
    // \u4E1A\u52A1\u903B\u8F91
    // ...
  }
});

server.listen(3000, "localhost", () => {
  console.log("Server is running at 3000");
});
